description: bust length portrait; man looking at viewer; wearing dark doublet and white ruff; in an oval frame inside a rectangle
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription
below image in black: [D. JACOBUS FRANQUART, Pictor ac Supre-/mus Serenissimorum ALBERTI et ISABELLÆ Bel-/gy Principum Architectis, annos natue 45, à D:ANNA/ FRANCISCA DE BRUYNS cognata aac Discipula sua an/nos nata 17 depictus, anno 1622/  W. Hollar fecit aqua forti, Ao 1648  Antwerpiæ]  on sheet in pencil:[1-430]
title: Portrait of D. Jacobus Franquart
